chara.textHome: Happy New Year to you♪

I'm Mitama Yakumo, your Coordinator,
and it's said I look even cuter and
more mature when I wear a kimono.

I'll be Coordinating again this year,
so I hope to see you!

Don't forget to bring along some
Grief Seeds when you visit, 'kay?

This fluffy fur collar is from a white fox
caught in the Hokuyo Ward mountains.
They made the fur out of its pelt.
Whether you believe me or not is up to you!♪

I've been asked by plenty of people
around town if I'd try modeling,
because I look so fetching in a kimono♪
Um, I'm telling the truth, you know!

This power! It must be because
I prayed at the shrine!

I feel refreshed and ready. Could it be
because a new year has dawned?

I got a glimpse of everyone's fun memories
from New Year's while enhancing them.

Knowing they had such a wonderful year
makes me a little jealous.

It's amazing how many different
New Year's wishes everyone had.

Some wanted good health or book smarts,
some a little romance...♪
How do I know?
*Giggle*

When it comes to New Year's wishes,
I can just tell
Welcome and Happy New Year♪
Tell me, what do you think of my kimono?
It suits me? It's cute? It's beautiful?!
Ohoho, tell me more!
Wake up, breakfast is ready.

Your Coordinator has prepared
a special soup just for you.
You'll be eating some today, understood?
Ahhh, I'm famished!

Let's peruse the food stalls on our
way to the shrine, okay?

Whenever you're not sure if you should eat
or not...it's perfectly all right to just dig in♪
I wish you a very happy New Year.
Now then...I have a special offer for you!

It's my Coordinator's special homemade
New Year's meal! Don't be shy, eat up♪

Normally there'd be a flood of customers
at this hour, but, since it's New Year's,
there isn't a soul in sight.
It's a little early, but let's close up for today.
Brrr... It's cold... Freezing!

If there's one thing I CANNOT
stand, it's the cold.

A piping hot bath and a steaming
bowl of soup to warm the body
are a must on days like today!
*Giggle*

These past few days
have been exceedingly profitable!

I'm so glad I kept the shop open through
New Year's.

The Coordinator's Operation:
New Year's Bonus was a success!

If you're on your way to fight Witches,
stop by the Coordinator's shop first.

If you have enough to pay, I may be able
to make special enhancements for you.
Don't miss out on this opportunity, okay?
Oh? Going to Endless Mirrors, are you?
I'll tag along then.

Not to worry, I'll just be waiting
at the entrance♪

I wished for sooo much during my visit
to the shrine on New Year's Day.

Never-ending customers, bustling business,
living in luxury...
There's plenty more, would you like to hear?
You're studying? That's wonderful...

What? Me?
Not to worry, I always do fine on tests.
Good luck now!

Oh, it's New Year's, so why not invite
everyone to the shop and make mochi?

Ahhh, soft mochi right off the
mallet...I can hardly wait♪
Hmm...what events should I hold this year?
A year goes by in the blink of an eye.
Guess I'd better start planning on day one!

I've always visited the local shrine
with my family on New Year's Day.

It's small, but the deity enshrined there has
protected households for generations so the
whole neighborhood comes to pay respects.

Weren't Iroha and the girls sooo
cute in their kimonos?

The three of them looked so much like dolls
that I had half a mind to take them home
with me!

Many Magical Girls pitched in to help me
decorate my shop for New Year's.

Kanagi was particularly helpful,
so I must be sure to thank her next time.
Wait...could it be true?! Really?!
Momoko is sharing all that delicious meat?!

Heehee... Wonderful!
We can cook it all up at once♪

What...I don't remember my usual
outfit being this tight...
Huh?!

No! That's not it!
I may have overeaten during New Year's,
but... I've maintained my figure!

The new year just started and we're
busy already♪
I'll buy some tangerines on my way home.
Yay♪ This is the card I needed!

Let's see what your fortune is...
Oh no, "Terrible Luck".

What an auspicious way to start
the new year♪

This year is going to be very different for
your Coordinator. My sales and wealth
are going to skyrocket, just wait♪

How lucky you are! 
You get to see me for New Year's like this♪

So you want to know your Coordinator's
secrets that badly, hm?
What's a girl to do...

I was just coming home from shopping
when I saw a man. He looked tired and
thirsty, so I gave him a tangerine.
As thanks, he gave me this kimono...
I'm kidding, of course.
